title: Two men nabbed for concealing Diesel
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lanka Special Task Force (STF) has arrested two persons for concealing 305L of diesel without a license in the Polwatta area in Padukka.
The two suspects were arrested and their three-wheeler was seized during a raid carried out based on a tip-off received by STF on Tuesday (14).
Moreover, the Padukka Police said that further investigations are underway.
30,000 MT of Furnace Oil at Port; NO USD to release for shipment
